resources.string: If you want to reset your leitner box and start again with five new empty boxes, click on the button bellow:
If you want to clear your \"Learned Words\" box, click on the button bellow:
Are you sure you want to clear all five boxes?
Are you sure you want to clear the \"Learned Words\" box?
There are no more words ready to learn in this box!
Are you sure you want to delete this word?

At the first scene you can choose which box from 5 boxes you want to go in; 

Or you can see all the words you have learned so far by going in the "all learned words" box. 

On the right hand side of this box you can see the number of all the words you have leaned so far. 

On the top toolbar you have 3 options: -from right to left- you go into "help", "settings" and "add words" respectively. 

By clicking on adding words button you can add a new word to your first box. Do not forget to fill both "word" and "meaning" parts. 

If you enter any of the boxes you can see the cards that are ready for you to see in that box. For each card you can see the meaning by clicking on the section bellow the part with the word in it. 

On the bottom you can click on either "I knew" (if you guessed the meaning right) or "I didn'	 know" buttons (if you couldn't guess the meaning right); 

Or you can just delete the word by clicking on "delete" button.
